meanings.sent1: I am transistorizing my old radio to make it work better.
meanings.sent2: The technician is transistorizing the circuit board for improved performance.
meanings.sent3: Why did the robot start transistorizing itself? It's becoming too advanced!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a workshop, constantly transistorizing new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The process of transistorizing can enhance the functionality of electronic devices.

meanings.definition: To convert to the use of transistors.
meanings.sent1: The company is transistorizing all their products to keep up with technology.
meanings.sent2: Many old devices are being transistorized to be more energy-efficient.
meanings.sent3: The town decided to transistorize all streetlights, making the nights brighter.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a switch, transistorizing her thoughts in an instant.
meanings.sent5: Transistorizing traditional systems can lead to significant improvements in efficiency.
